allies.name: Allies
allies.description: Close companions who could be called on for most anything.

contacts.name: Contacts
contacts.description: Those willing to help for a favor in return.

fame.name: Fame
fame.description: How well-known the character is in society; its counterpart Notoriety generally carries negative connotation.

influence.name: Influence
influence.description: A character's ability to affect mortal society.  Elder Vampires can enjoy influence around the world.

mentor.name: Mentor
mentor.description: An experienced guide through the supernatural or everyday world.

resources.name: Resources
resources.description: How much a character has to live on.

status.name: Status
status.description: Where a character ranks in a particular social structure.
